001package com.technototes.library.hardware2;
002
003import com.qualcomm.hardware.bosch.BNO055IMU;
004import com.qualcomm.hardware.bosch.BNO055IMUImpl;
005import java.util.function.Consumer;
006import org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.navigation.AxesOrder;
007
008/**
009 * TODO: Remove this. I don't believe this adds much value. Yeah, HardwareMap.get is weird, but
010 * it's in all the documentation, so just read it, see it in the examples, and you're done.
011 */
012public class IMUBuilder extends HardwareBuilder<BNO055IMU> {
013
014    /**
015     * This is duplicated in the IMU class
016     */
017    public enum AxesSigns {
018        /**
019         * deprecated
020         */
021        PPP(0b000),
022        /**
023         * deprecated
024         */
025        PPN(0b001),
026        /**
027         * deprecated
028         */
029        PNP(0b010),
030        /**
031         * deprecated
032         */
033        PNN(0b011),
034        /**
035         * deprecated
036         */
037        NPP(0b100),
038        /**
039         * deprecated
040         */
041        NPN(0b101),
042        /**
043         * deprecated
044         */
045        NNP(0b110),
046        /**
047         * deprecated
048         */
049        NNN(0b111);
050
051        /**
052         * deprecated
053         */
054        public final int bVal;
055
056        /**
057         * deprecated
058         */
059        AxesSigns(int bVal) {
060            this.bVal = bVal;
061        }
062    }
063
064    private BNO055IMU.Parameters parameters;
065
066    /**
067     * deprecated
068     *
069     * @param name Deprecated
070     */
071    public IMUBuilder(String name) {
072        super(name);
073        parameters = new BNO055IMU.Parameters();
074    }
075
076    /**
077     * Deprecated
078     *
079     * @param device Deprecated
080     */
081    public IMUBuilder(BNO055IMUImpl device) {
082        super(device);
083        parameters = new BNO055IMU.Parameters();
084    }
085
086    /**
087     * Deprecated
088     *
089     * @param consumer Deprecated
090     * @return Deprecated
091     */
092    public IMUBuilder parameter(Consumer<BNO055IMU.Parameters> consumer) {
093        consumer.accept(parameters);
094        return this;
095    }
096
097    /**
098     * Deprecated
099     *
100     * @return Deprecated
101     */
102    public IMUBuilder degrees() {
103        parameters.angleUnit = BNO055IMU.AngleUnit.DEGREES;
104        return this;
105    }
106
107    /**
108     * Deprecated
109     *
110     * @return Deprecated
111     */
112    public IMUBuilder radians() {
113        parameters.angleUnit = BNO055IMU.AngleUnit.RADIANS;
114        return this;
115    }
116
117    /**
118     * Deprecated
119     *
120     * @param order Deprecated
121     * @param signs Deprecated
122     * @return Deprecated
123     */
124    public IMUBuilder remap(AxesOrder order, AxesSigns signs) {
125        try {
126            // the indices correspond with the 2-bit encodings specified in the datasheet
127            int[] indices = order.indices();
128            int axisMapConfig = 0;
129            axisMapConfig |= (indices[0] << 4);
130            axisMapConfig |= (indices[1] << 2);
131            axisMapConfig |= (indices[2]);
132
133            // the BNO055 driver flips the first orientation vector so we also flip here
134            int axisMapSign = signs.bVal ^ (0b100 >> indices[0]);
135
136            // Enter CONFIG mode
137            product.write8(BNO055IMU.Register.OPR_MODE, BNO055IMU.SensorMode.CONFIG.bVal & 0x0F);
138
139            Thread.sleep(100);
140
141            // Write the AXIS_MAP_CONFIG register
142            product.write8(BNO055IMU.Register.AXIS_MAP_CONFIG, axisMapConfig & 0x3F);
143
144            // Write the AXIS_MAP_SIGN register
145            product.write8(BNO055IMU.Register.AXIS_MAP_SIGN, axisMapSign & 0x07);
146
147            // Switch back to the previous mode
148            product.write8(BNO055IMU.Register.OPR_MODE, product.getParameters().mode.bVal & 0x0F);
149
150            Thread.sleep(100);
151        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
152            Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
153        }
154        parameters = product.getParameters();
155        return this;
156    }
157
158    /**
159     * Deprecated
160     *
161     * @param <U> Deprecated
162     * @return Deprecated
163     */
164    @Override
165    public <U extends BNO055IMU> U build() {
166        product.initialize(parameters);
167        return (U) product;
168    }
169}
